answers.answer: Id probably give the docs a jingle being that all.the pregnancies had complications.

U not paranoid hun after your history its normal u feel worried bt the good think is u made it to 34+ 4 and everything is fine, remember every pregnancy is different and u may be just fine with dis one, still with all those symptoms u need to go see your doctor just incase and i think with ur history they should keep extra eye on u anyway ... Good luck and all the best
Given your history, I'd say you made it further along in your own this time. But sounds like its all happening again. I'd call to see what doc says.
Its better t o be same.I am worried about the blurred vision.sounds like pre e.and since u hv history pls give doc a call or go to er
I meant better to be safe
I'd pop myself right over to the er and even if you are just paranoid then you can stop worrying if they say your fine!!

question: Hi there,I am currently 34+4 pregnant with baby number 3. All my pregnancies have been complicated (B#1- normal pregnancy til waters broke at 32weeks with symptoms of preeclampsia stopped it and with bed rest made it to 37 weeksin the end he was born via ememergency csection)(B#2-  up to 22 weeks was normal then preterm labour started , preeclampsia present more severe then with b#1 and born via emergency csection at 32weeks)This past week ive experinced shortness of breath leg cramping serverly painful abdominal pain in the upper right side uterus tightening feet being slightly swollen vomiting headache painful heart burn dizziness itchness blurred vision (seeing specs) and less urine output. While I do get these symptoms are/can be normal part of pregnancy given my history should I be worriedEnough to ring the hospital or am i being a sook ?
title: am I being paranoid?
